text: Karl Johan Edvardsen (11 November 1883 - 18 September 1963) was a Norwegian politician for the Liberal Party. He was born in Brunlanes. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Vestfold in 1950, but was not re-elected in 1954. Edvardsen held various positions in Brunlanes municipality council between 1919 and 1951, serving as deputy mayor in the periods 1928-1931 and 1931-1934 and as mayor in 1934-1937, 1937-1945, 1945-1947 and 1947-1951\. He was also a member of Vestfold county council. ==References== * Category:1883 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Members of the Storting Category:Liberal Party (Norway) politicians Category:People from Larvik Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Karl Johan Edvardsen
